description.full: You must have an Xbox 360 hard drive to play this game  Players: 1. Indigo Prophecy™ is an innovative adventure game that tells the story of Lucas Kane—an ordinary man who unconsciously commits a random act of murder. Through the use of branching storylines and multiple character perspectives, players embark on an immersive adventure on par with a Hollywood thriller. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
